overview: Arnoul is a frog, but not an ordinary one, on the one hand he is not real, on the other hand he can speak and he does it with passion. As the mascot of the popular “Kanechon” café in a no less popular seaside town, he saw how people find each other or diverge, how crazy film projects are forged, pure pipe dreams, but who knows? The main thing is that the day ends or begins with a pudding or rock 'n' roll.
title: The Color of Happiness
